slc.shoppinglist Changelog

- Added EUPL license (deroiste)
- guard against missing shoppinglist property on member, fixes #8119 of gocept tracker
  [thomasw]

- added basic testing (thomasw)

- updated svnignore (thomasw)

- Packaged egg (pilz)

- Initial port
